       <section class="contentBox bottomGap cf">
        <h1>
         Journals
        </h1>
        <div class="rteContent">
         <p>
          Explore our scientific journals and find out more about the benefits to authors and readers.
         </p>
        </div>
        <section class="cf">
         <div class="oneThirdWidth leftGutter right">
          <h3 class="semi">
           <a href="/journals/authors" title="Authors">
            Authors
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p>
           We offer a first-class level of author service, high production values and worldwide dissemination in well-read and highly-cited journals.
          </p>
          <a class="btn btnBordered fullWidth" href="/journals/authors">
           View benefits for authors
          </a>
          <h3 class="semi">
           <a href="/journals/librarians" title="Librarians">
            Librarians
           </a>
          </h3>
          <p>
           We offer 350 years of research across the whole of science, at transparent prices and with perpetual access to subscribed years.
          </p>
          <a class="btn btnBordered fullWidth" href="/journals/librarians">
           View benefits for institutions
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="twoThirdWidth left">
          <section class="heroImageOverlayContainer">
           <div class="lazyLoad halfRatio">
            <noscript data-alt="Science in the making" data-src="/~/media/journals/spotlight-features/ship penguin.jpg">
             <img alt="Science in the making" src="/~/media/journals/spotlight-features/ship penguin.jpg"/>
            </noscript>
           </div>
           <article class="heroImageOverlay cf">
            <div class="contentOverlay left">
             <h3>
              <a href="https://makingscience.royalsociety.org" title="New and free to use: Science in the making ">
               New and free to use: Science in the making
              </a>
             </h3>
             <p>
              Search, browse, transcribe and comment on content from our archives related to the history of scientific publishing - now available online for the first time.
             </p>
            </div>
           </article>
          </section>
          <div class="colList twoCol cf topGap">
           <article class="col">
            <h4 class="semi">
             <a class="secondaryLink" href="/journals/publishing-activities/publishing350/history-philosophical-transactions" title="Over 350 years of publishing">
              Over 350 years of publishing
             </a>
            </h4>
            <p>
             Find out about the history of the longest running science journal, Philosophical Transactions.
            </p>
           </article>
           <article class="col">
            <h4 class="semi">
             <a class="secondaryLink" href="/journals/publishing-activities/journal-collection-science-in-the-making" title="Our journal archive">
              Our journal archive
             </a>
            </h4>
            <p>
             Explore articles by Isaac Newton, Kathleen Lonsdale and more in the Royal Society Journal Collection.
            </p>
           </article>
          </div>
         </div>
        </section>
       </section>
